name: transport-02
description: FleetOps is a **conceptual frontend-only SaaS dashboard** for transport and fleet operations management. The project is part of a larger professional portfolio and focuses on **application architecture, UI state management, and SaaS-style navigation patterns**, rather than backend implementation.

scripts.min:all: npm run min:css && npm run min:js
